description.meta: Discover my profile, my motivations and my values as a fullstack software engineer.
description.content:
I am Lo√Øk, a fullstack developer passionate about technology and the environment. Since the beginning of my career, my commitment to the environmental cause has guided my project choices, with significant experience in projects focused on dematerialization. I am also fascinated by blockchain and the opportunities for freedom and transparency it offers.

It is only natural that I am looking for an opportunity in a company that shares my environmental and decentralization values, focused on innovation and collaboration.
